comment._content: nla.gov.au/nla.news-article15887307 ; nla.gov.au/nla.news-article16204424 ??? J.F. McKimm possibly the chap middle row lhs ...but he also looks a bit like this chap (could they be the same person?) investigator.records.nsw.gov.au/asp/photosearch/photo.asp... nla.gov.au/nla.news-article16185524 ??? Loris Ingamells possibly chap in middle of middle row investigator.records.nsw.gov.au/asp/photosearch/search.as... looks a bit like a younger version of the chap 2nd from rhs middle row Maybe the NSW Pharmacy Board...ca. mid 1920s...but I don't think the board had this many members...other possibilities ? the NSW Pharmaceutical Society...NSW Association of Master Pharmacists...anyone out there written a thesis on the history of pharmacy in NSW (by chance)? Note how there's 13 of them...a pharmacists' rugby league team perhaps? nla.gov.au/nla.news-article16488510 we see Ingamells in this SMH pic of delegates to the 1928 Federated Pharmaceutical Guild of Australia...and we also see W.J. Archer, who looks like the chap we see in the middle row rhs in the SRNSW pic... nla.gov.au/nla.news-article16117674 ? L.W. Smith...possibly the chap in the front row lhs
